name: slack-archivebot
description: Automatically archive empty and inactive public channels.

ARCHIVEBOT_SLACK_TOKEN.description: The Slack Web API key to use (must be a regular user account, not a bot).

ARCHIVEBOT_INACTIVE_DAYS.description: The number of days' inactivity after which to archive a channel.

ARCHIVEBOT_NOTIFY.description: A Slack user or channel (e.g. #general or @tblair) to notify when something goes wrong.
